description: Learn the basics of web design with HTML & CSS. Start creating responsive and attractive websites right away!
Dive into JavaScript programming and master interactive web elements.
Master Python and its frameworks for web development, automation, and data analysis.
Learn how to design responsive websites that adapt to all devices.
Start building interactive interfaces with React and learn the basics of modern web development.
Learn backend development with Node.js and build server-side applications using Express.
Understand PHP and how to use it to build dynamic websites and web applications.
Learn how to interact with databases using SQL and build efficient websites.
Discover best practices for developing websites optimized for mobile devices.
Learn the basics of user interface and user experience design to create user-friendly websites.
Master modern layout techniques like Flexbox and CSS Grid to create advanced designs.
Practice JavaScript and use it to add dynamic features to your websites.
Learn how to secure your web applications and protect against common vulnerabilities.
Discover the basics of Git, version control, and collaboration with GitHub.
Understand Agile principles and how to apply them to modern web development workflows.
